page.title: 14Trade in Lorton
page.content: There is very little trade carried on in this area. The shop in Low Lorton benefits more from the seasonal tourist than local shoppers who often shop in nearby towns. This shop offers all forms of groceries and dry goods. Also, on Sundays which is their busiest day, newspapers. The Wheatsheaf Inn is also dependant on tourists staying in the area and to some extent day trippers from nearby towns. A small transport business operates from a nearby farm. The only other trading in Lorton is a nusery garden which was started 5 years ago and now sells plants and trees at various town markets throughout the County of Cumbria.
